title: Magic flute
data:
| ( [![Flute.png](/images/d/db/Flute.png)](/wiki/File:Flute.png) |                                  |
| -------------------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------- |
| Name                                                           | magic flute                      |
| Appearance                                                     | [flute](/wiki/Flute "Flute")     |
| Base price                                                     | 36 [zm](/wiki/Zorkmid "Zorkmid") |
| Weight                                                         | [5](/wiki/Weight "Weight")       |
| Material                                                       | [wood](/wiki/Wood "Wood")        |
| Monster use                                                    | *Will not be used by monsters.*  |

A **magic flute** is a magical [tonal](/wiki/Tonal_instrument "Tonal instrument") [instrument](/wiki/Instrument "Instrument"),[\[1\]](#cite_note-1) and it can be used to play the [passtune](/wiki/Passtune "Passtune"). Improvising with a [charged](/wiki/Charged "Charged") magic flute will produce "soft music" ("piped" if hallucinating) and will put nearby [monsters](/wiki/Monster "Monster") (including [pets](/wiki/Pet "Pet")) to [sleep](/wiki/Sleep "Sleep")[\[2\]](#cite_note-2) unless they resist (see below). It also [exercises](/wiki/Exercise "Exercise") [dexterity](/wiki/Dexterity "Dexterity")[\[3\]](#cite_note-3) and consumes a charge.[\[4\]](#cite_note-4)

An uncharged magic flute behaves as a [wooden flute](/wiki/Wooden_flute "Wooden flute").[\[5\]](#cite_note-5)

The [usage fee](/wiki/Usage_fee "Usage fee") for a charged magic flute is one quarter of the full price.[\[6\]](#cite_note-6)

[ ]

## Contents

- [1 Detailed effect](#Detailed_effect)
- [2 Charging](#Charging)
- [3 Messages](#Messages)
- [4 Strategy](#Strategy)
- [5 Encyclopedia entry](#Encyclopedia_entry)
- [6 References](#References)

## Detailed effect

[Sleep resistance](/wiki/Sleep_resistance "Sleep resistance") prevents this attack from succeeding. Monsters may also prevent the attack using their innate [magic resistance](/wiki/Magic_resistance_\(monster\) "Magic resistance (monster)"). There is no message given if a monster falls asleep; the only indication without a [stethoscope](/wiki/Stethoscope "Stethoscope") or similar tool is the lack of movement.

Monsters are affected for [10d10](/wiki/D_notation "D notation") turns,[\[7\]](#cite_note-7) after which they may be [roused](/wiki/Noise "Noise").[\[8\]](#cite_note-8)

The radius of the effect is ![\sqrt{XPlevel \times 5}](/images/math/4/7/1/471700720cc928e2a410609191b36011.png) [squares](/wiki/Square "Square"). At various levels this calculates to:

| Level | Radius |
| ----- | ------ |
| 1     | 2      |
| 5     | 5      |
| 14    | 8      |
| 30    | 12     |

## Charging

- *Main article: [Charging](/wiki/Charging "Charging")*

A magic flute is generated with 1d5 + 4 charges.[\[9\]](#cite_note-9) It may be charged any number of times.[\[10\]](#cite_note-10)

[Uncursed](/wiki/Uncursed "Uncursed") [charging](/wiki/Charging "Charging") adds 1d4 charges to a magic flute.[\[11\]](#cite_note-11) Blessed charging adds 2d4 charges.[\[12\]](#cite_note-12) In either case, there is a maximum of 20 charges.[\[13\]](#cite_note-13)

## Messages

- You start playing the flute. You produce soft music.

  You improvised on a magic flute.

## Strategy

The magic flute has its biggest advantage over the wand of sleep or sleep spell in that those methods are targeted in a single direction, while the magic flute is omnidirectional. This comes in handy in open-spaced levels where the player may be attacked from all sides, or as a defense against monsters who immediately summon other monsters completely surrounding the player. Similar to doorway combat, a player with [stealth](/wiki/Stealth "Stealth") can use the sleeping monsters as protection, and funnel the remaining monsters through to fight them one-by-one.

A player with the [Tourist](/wiki/Tourist "Tourist") quest artifact, [The Platinum Yendorian Express Card](/wiki/The_Platinum_Yendorian_Express_Card "The Platinum Yendorian Express Card"), can make frequent use of the magic flute as it can be recharged infinitely.

## Encyclopedia entry

With this thou canst do mighty deeds  
        And change men's passions for thy needs:  
        A man's despair with joy allay,  
        Turn bachelors old to lovers gay.

The Magic Flute, by Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart
